as we were leaving my spouse and i exchanged two simple words never again we paid a visit to this spot in hopes of enjoying a sundae but it turned out to be just okay interestingly enough max brenner is conveniently located nearby making the choice to go here feel like falling for a tourist trap despite knowing about the negative feedback others insisted on going personally i would have preferred purchasing three unique flavors of ben and jerrys ice cream from the supermarket instead

statement 2 although the employees here are polite and friendly they lack individuality and seem to move through their tasks like lifeless zombies when i ordered the coconut chicken soup i was surprised to find that the majority of its contents were mushrooms instead moreover the soup itself lacked flavor and failed to entice me to finish it however salvaging the experience were the occasional bits of chicken hidden within on the other hand my partner thoroughly enjoyed their usual thai dish of mint pork finding it to be perfectly spiced and exceptionally tasty if we were to reconsider another visit it would be purely for their satisfaction and to opt for takeout as for my daughters choice of beef broccoli she appreciated the flavors of the beef and broccoli but was put off by an overly briny sauce due to an excessive amount of clam juice expect a rather noisy crowd with complaints leaning more towards the uncivilized side but i must admit that the employees handled these situations gracefully almost mechanically as if they were secretly expressing their frustration in the kitchen all things considered i do not recommend visiting this establishment unless youre willing to take a gamble

five guys seems to have cracked the code when it comes to adhering to a legacy food regulation in north carolina that forbids serving medium rare beef nevertheless they manage to serve mouthwatering burgers through a combination of factors like their special grind with just the right amount of fat and their cooking method on the flattop tailored to individual preferences moreover their burgers are accompanied by an array of toppings to choose from and their fries are simply irresistible—freshly prepared perfectly cut and served almost flawlessly either plain or seasoned with delectable cajun spices a remarkable aspect is their dedication to fries going so far as to provide the location details of the potatoes used and offering malt vinegar for those seeking a unique flavor remarkably the staff at this particular location excels at maintaining a steady supply of burgers and fries even during peak hours while consistently delivering friendly customer service this comprehensive package earns them high accolades

prior to sharing my review i would like to mention a couple of facts firstly i was dining with my chinese boyfriend and his family secondly they took charge of ordering our meal aiming for an authentic chinese dining experience lastly in an effort to make the most out of the situation i kindly consumed a large portion of rice

on a sweltering and fatigueinducing saturday afternoon i treated myself to an exceptionally delightful iced mocha savoring every last drop i longed for my cup to spontaneously replenish itself the shops chilled and functional atmosphere along with the baristas impressive skills captivated me entirely if only there were more locations where i could relish their beverages

i placed an order for a sandwich over an hour and 10 minutes ago from this particular sandwich shop intending it to be delivered however upon calling them to inquire about the delay i was informed that my address falls outside their delivery zone its disappointing because im merely 3 miles away from their location and i even provided them with my phone number and hotel details expecting some form of communication unfortunately im on a business trip without a car so i heavily relied on delivery its now past midnight and i dislike eating at such late hours now i have to find an alternative means to satiate my hunger this experience has left me slightly frustrated enough to consider leaving an unfavorable review on yelp  both due to the poor service and their clichéd attempts at humor

staying at the mgm grand was overall pleasant due to its impressive size and the stunning nighttime illumination the majestic lion sculpture in front of the hotel made it easily recognizable inside the immense and luxurious lobby welcomed us and the counter staff were exceedingly amicable promptly securing our suite reservation after housekeeping attended to it although the standard room was acceptable my companions lucky find – a bottle in his bed – prompted an upgrade to a more spacious suite let me assure you this experience felt like living in abundance with frequent visits from the attentive staff ensuring our comfort nonetheless the quality of food ordered through room service left much to be desired and the lack of a kitchenette limited culinary options to unsatisfying pizza and chilly breakfast

the name of this place has always fascinated me whenever i drove past it however on a rainy and gloomy evening a few months ago while waiting for a phone call from a lovely young woman who i thought was ditching me i walked into the establishment with hunger driving me onward i was determined to have the exotic passionate and modern experience promised by its name and sign

after considering the breakfast i decided to give them a commendable fivestar rating nevertheless i strongly suggest that they upgrade their air conditioning system for the rooms currently it resembles a swamp cooler rather than a standard ac unit resulting in an excessively hot and humid environment this certainly deviates from my past experiences at different embassy suites moreover it would have been ideal if they had more towels readily accessible at the pool thankfully after an extended wait someone arrived with extra towels prompting me to elevate my rating to three stars

i will rate them with five stars due to the breakfast however they should consider updating their air conditioning system as the rooms feel more like a swamp cooler than a typical ac unit the rooms often become hot and humid adding discomfort i have stayed at various embassy suites before and have not experienced this issue additionally it would have been better if there were more towels available at the pool fortunately someone eventually brought more towels which improved my rating to three stars

overall i didnt have an exceptional dining experience at this restaurant hopefully the other branches of wildfish seafood grille offer a more fulfilling experience the bill came out to around 80 which is expected for seafood but considering the quality of service food and atmosphere i didnt feel like we fully got our moneys worth

the mgm hotel provided a satisfactory stay as its massive structure was covered in a mesmerizing green glow at night with the iconic lion statue upfront it was easy to locate the lobby was grand and opulent and the staff at the reception were exceptionally friendly ensuring a swift checkin process although the regular room was decent my travel companion discovered a bottle in his bed after housekeeping had been by leading us to be upgraded to a larger suite the suite was gigantic and the attentive staff frequently checked in on us however the food from room service was disappointing and the absence of a kitchenette prevented me from cooking something more enjoyable than the mediocre pizza and cold breakfast
in total we spent 44 for three coffees two breakfast meals and a tip it may be a bit pricey but well worth it for soaking up your last night in vegas and returning to functioning as a human being

when i have meals with my chinese inlaws visiting from china i always begin by washing my hands thoroughly especially at decent restaurants unfortunately the condition of the restroom at diamonds almost made me nauseous as a mortician i encounter putrid smells regularly so finding a bathroom that affects me like this is truly remarkable despite all this i felt obligated to stay and eat after leaving the bathroom i resorted to using antibacterial hand sanitizer instead

i arrived early to meet up with my friend for her birthday lunch and i requested a wheelchairaccessible table despite the bustling crowd my request was promptly granted the server appeared preoccupied radiating seriousness with an almost stern demeanor while my friend opted for her favorite appetizer i decided on the salad and minestrone soup  both tasted just as delightful as i had remembered it struck me as odd that the server offered parmesan for the salad but not the soup as we enjoyed our meal the server kindly informed us that she was about to take a break but assured us that we could stay as long as we wished  adding a nice and thoughtful touch by mentioning another server who could assist us

having been a regular customer for an entire year i have finally decided to share my thoughts on pho nam a familyowned vietnamese eatery throughout our visits they have never failed to serve delectable vietnamese dishes accompanied by exceptional service this restaurant has become our goto spot for sunday lunches especially during the colder months where we usually indulge in their fragrant pho with rare beef and scrumptious vermicelli with pork
